scripts.build: rm -rf deploy_build && parcel build -d deploy_build src/index.html && echo 'testnet-dczk.gwei.cz' > deploy_build/CNAME
scripts.deploy: num run build && npm run deploy-git
scripts.deploy-git: rm -rf deploy_build/.git && cd deploy_build && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:gweicz/gweicz.github.io.git && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages --force
